Name: Hex of the Lich
About the game: The hall stinks of rot and decay. You feel the gaze of countless horrors as you enter the room, each thrice your size. You pause only for a moment to ready your wand, before unleashing a barrage of eldritch obliteration. One by one, you fell the beasts. In a chest across the room you spot your prize: a horde of gleaming hexes, rife with arcane energy. Hex of the Lich is a turn-based dungeon-crawler roguelike with a twist: Spellcrafting! 80+ Spells to learn and master Spells are built of hexes and super customizable 60+ Effects that upgrade spells, including lasers, explosions, chain lightning, buffs, curses, and more Summon tentacles, robots, and undead horrors Unlock more powerful spells as you delve deeper Can you break the Hex of the Lich?
